text: Michael Gwisdek (14 January 1942 â€“ 22 September 2020) was a German actor and movie director. He was born in Berlin. His first movie was Treffen in Travers (1988). He was also known for his works The Big Mambo (1998) and Nightshapes (1999). Gwisdek died on 22 September 2020, aged 78.Schauspieler Michael Gwisdek gestorben ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German movie directors Category:German screenwriters Category:German stage actors Category:Actors from Berlin Category:Writers from Berlin
